mapper.select: select id, member_name, member_email, member_password, member_address, member_address_detail, member_status, member_phone, created_date from tbl_member

select id, corporation_name, corporation_address, corporation_address_detail, corporation_type, corporation_owner, corporation_email, corporation_password, corporation_homepage, corporation_gen, corporation_sales, corporation_code, corporation_employees_number, created_date tbl_corporation
